    A class for the landlords.

        Returns:

        Parameters:

      • askCustomer

        public java.lang.String askCustomer()
        A method to ask the customer -- includes both greetings and offerings in the instance variables.
        Returns:
        a string to pass on to the customer.

      • serveDrink

        public java.lang.String serveDrink()
        A method that calls upon the strategy instance for serving drinks.
        Returns:
        an information string for the clients once the drink has been prepared.
